# destinationAlphaBlendFactor

**Instance Property**

Configures the destination-alpha blend factor.

## Declaration

```swift
var destinationAlphaBlendFactor: MTLBlendFactor { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defaults to `MTLBlendFactorZero`.
